locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ We come here for the big, beautiful showers! Nothing like a new shower. Great laundry facilities and ample parking for semis. ‚Ä¶

Been there twice this week and went to get a shower and no hot water went to the fuel desk and ask them whats was going on and there answer was the manager turned it way down to save on the water and eletric thats not rite people dont want ‚Ä¶

My husband stopped this evening to grab a shower and a meal before heading to his delivery. I‚Äôm sad to say this is the grossest shower he‚Äôs ever encountered‚Ä¶ including mom and pops that don‚Äôt have the money for employees & upkeep. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ bathroom. Toilet paper and feces, bowel movement, fecal matter all over. I tried used free shower on my app to use that bathroom.  Attendant tried opening the door, yelled from outside that $15.00 needed to be paid for shower. To use ‚Ä¶

Sadly this Loves is 3 yrs old and the showers and bathrooms are not cleaned. Come thru here every 3 days and nothing changes. The pot hole in the parking lot that should of been maintained since this place is new. I question they have a ‚Ä¶
In my experience, Love's is the cleanest nationwide truck stop. That's why the shower today was so disappointing. ‚Ä¶
Clean place. Drink machine tasted awful. Shower was full of water. Maintenance man at the pump was very friendly and helpful.
Stopped in for a shower. 3 stars because the showers could've been much cleaner. Pretty gross to shower with someone else's hair in the shower floor. Service was friendly üôÇ ‚Ä¶
I spent 729.00 for fuel and DEF. But because I don‚Äôt have a Love Card I‚Äôm not eligible for a free shower. Last time any of my trucks fuel at a Love‚Äôs.

‚Ä¶ to this stop they're got the door and they ask us for $12 hey man you got $12 hey man you got a shower we're tired goodbye and what about these displays they called in the middle before what is this is just something out of their house ‚Ä¶

locations.title: ONE9 Travel Center
locations.content: ONE9 Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ & great pressure! $3.34G. Cassandra welcomed me n was sweet w a great smile. Reminded me its driver month and gave her gratitude. Berry was working the showers n they were spotless. Shower line on app moved fastüí™üèΩ. Kudos to a great team ! ‚Ä¶
One9 is owned by Pilot. Large parking lot. Clean & spacious Shower rooms. Faster if you use the app to purchase showers. Wifi is poor so you may have to try a few times.

‚Ä¶ at least once a week and I always have the same problem. I have to wait anywhere from 1 to 2 hours for a shower when there are plenty of empty showers that need cleaning. And when I approach an employee about it they get mad and are ‚Ä¶
It was a good place to park and shower. I really have given up on great service these days, so as long as I can get what I need without being disrespected, it's good enough.
Going strictly by the shower experience, excellent.  Brand new showers, lots of space, two shower heads, and most importantly good water pressure.
Nice clean shower the washer need to be clean other folks hair or dog ,cat hair. Can't wait yall got big vancant room for some healthy food vegetables  fruits seafood  lol have bless day.

‚Ä¶ extremely rare that I give a five star to any Truck stop period so we assured you people earned it. This is based on my shower experience. Besides being Roomier, The water was just right that is, Not over soft and in slimy when rinsing.
No personal for clean shower
My 3rd time parking up here in a week. Always a ton of parking and little to no wait for a shower which I think are the biggest and best appointed I have seen!

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ The shower water was lukewarm at best, the cold rooms made it even more difficult to get clean. The entire store was freezing, every time an outer door was opened the wind gust made my teeth chatter. ‚Ä¶
The shower is broken Why you open the shower if it‚Äôs broken

‚Ä¶ Super dissatisfied (male) since here they close the showers before 1 am so as not to clean them during the night and the lady who calls herself Management does not realize that we drivers need to take a shower so we can relax and rest to be ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ stop of mine for food, but night shift's laziness has ruined my day for the last time. Three times in a row there's a line for a shower at 3 am. I may still stop for the restaurant across the road, but I will never spend money (mine or ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and the staff are very friendly but the bathrooms were pretty disappointing. Paying for a shower and then to go in and find there is no toilet paper or bags in the garbage. The over head light was broken so the lighting sucked and the tile ‚Ä¶

Lots of truck parking. No place to wait while waiting for a shower which took over 30 minutes. If you're a bigger person good luck in the phone booth shower, might wanna try a remodel and actually consider truckers

Cold shower, and got my food order wrong, but they did however fix the order. You must provide driver's with a hot shower if you expect to get a good reviews. As you advertise. We currently have no wait for a shower. Please park your truck ‚Ä¶
showerReviews.uniqueId: KMD TRANSPORTATION INC. Lease operator_Cold_shower,_and_got_my_food_order_wrong,_but_they_4 years ago

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice stop. Ample parking, friendly people. What I saw was clean. Arby's and cinnabon were good. Possibly a 5 star, but without using shower or the shop I don't know. Needs a pet enclosure for dogs.

‚Ä¶ need gas, food and pick up those little odd things you think are cute. One of my favorites. They also take the TN lottery which is one of my past time fun games to play. They have it all. Place to shower if you need to, while traveling.üòä ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and fresh. Looking into the other side I noticed it was really busy. Their was a constant call over the loud speaker about  certain people who were up next for a shower. They also would announce when a shower was freed up so someone not on ‚Ä¶

locations.title: 101 Travel Center
locations.content: 101 Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Came for the steak, wound up needing front end work. The pot holes are rowdy and consistent throughout the entire lot. The staff is very nice, the bathrooms are not. If you‚Äôre looking for a deal on a biker jacket, this is the place. 5 stars for being nothing like Loves, Pilot, or TA.

Half of the diesel pumps are broken.  Bathrooms were relatively clean.  Very large parking lot for semis.  Helmets,  leggings, variety of other clothing.  Chicken. Burgers. Philly cheese steak for warm food options. The place could use some ‚Ä¶

Almost always find parking because it‚Äôs a huge dirt lot.  The driveway has a suspension killing crater so come in slow. Most of the lot is full of craters also so don‚Äôt be hauling a## if you like your truck. The store and bathrooms are ‚Ä¶
Cool nostalgic sign. Most of the building appears unused. Overall the place has some creepy vibes. I can't complain too much though - they provided a restroom and I did find something to eat.

Lots of truck parking. Bathrooms were filthy and vandalized.
Store had lots of items not typically found at truck stops such as household items and a variety of clothing. ‚Ä¶
